Title: Critters
Writer: Domonic Muir (story by), Domonic Muir (screenplay by), Stephen Herek (screenplay by), Don Keith Opper (additional scenes written by)
Actors: Dee Wallace, M. Emmet Walsh, Billy Green Bush, Scott Grimes
Plot: A massive ball of furry creatures from another world eat their way through a small mid-western town followed by intergalactic bounty hunters opposed only by militant townspeople.
